name: Beat the Meat
description: You're the 666th satanic monk and you've been chosen to run Hell's gauntlet! Rise and win your freedom to float ever upwards. Beware the wall of flesh approaching ready to drag you back to the depths. The light is fading... it gets darker the further you stray from the fiery depths so keep grabbing those torch skulls to see where you're going! WASD to move and jump SPACE to start, ESC to pause. Made for the Scream jam by the North East Jam Junkies team of 4.
